articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on Oct. 3.
					 The message said:
					
					 Your Excellency Comrade First Secretary
					
					 I extend most heartfelt warm congratulations to Your Excellency and, through Your Excellency, to the Workers' Party of Korea and all the Korean people on behalf of President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder-chairman of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, and all party members and supporters on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the great anniversary of the Korean people.
					
					 We wish Your Excellency will grandly celebrate this historic day.
					
					 Please accept my highest regards.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on Sept. 29.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade First Secretary
					
					 I deem it an honor to extend the warmest congratulations and fraternal greeting to you on behalf of all members and supporters of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 We are convinced that the WPK has been strengthened into the party of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il while successfully carrying out its precious political programmes and historic tasks to win the final victory of the cause of building a thriving socialist nation and the world socialist cause under your wise Songun leadership.
					
					 Availing myself of this significant opportunity, I sincerely wish you great successes in your precious work to strengthen the WPK, build a socialist economic power and a highly civilized socialist nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 Please accept my highest regards.

articles.title: UN Briefing on Report of DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies Held
articles.content:
UN Briefing on Report of DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies Held 
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies released a report on the DPR of Korea's policy for ensuring genuine human rights and reality of its people enjoying human rights, sparking great sensation among the international community. A briefing on the report took place at the building of the United Nations headquarters on October 7. 
					 Present at the briefing were at least 150 figures including diplomatic envoys and those related to human rights of missions of foreign countries in the UN, representatives of non-governmental human rights organs and correspondents of the press corps in the UN. 
					
					 The briefing made general introduction of the purport of the report released by the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies and its contents and referred to the DPR of Korea's principled stand on the issue of human rights and its efforts for improving popular masses' enjoyment of human rights. The questions raised were answered. 
					
					 The majority of the participants properly understood and expressed sympathy with the DPR of Korea's policy on human rights, system ensuring human rights and reality of its people's full enjoyment of human rights. 
					
					 They positively appreciated the DPR of Korea's measures for dialogue and cooperation in the field of human rights and its will for cooperation. 
					
					 Representatives of the U.S. and other Western countries in the briefing could not but keep mum in face of the denunciation and censure of the fact that the "information" and "resolution" on human rights performance in the DPRK spread by the U.S. and the West are a typical example of politicization of human rights, selectivity and double-standards. 
					
					 CNN, AP, Kyodo and other foreign media widely reported about this briefing. 
					
					 The hostile forces are making desperate efforts to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK and stifle the ideology and social system chosen by the Korean people. However, the DPRK will take decisive measures to cope with it and make consistent efforts to realize the beautiful dream and ideal of the people by stepping up the building of a thriving nation, provide better conditions for human rights and boost international cooperation in the field of human rights.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Urges S. Korean Regime to Stop Anti-DPRK Leaflet-scattering Operation
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Urges S. Korean Regime to Stop Anti-DPRK Leaflet-scattering Operation 
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Thursday released information bulletin No. 1075 in connection with the fact that the riff-raffs of the "Alliance for the Movement of Free North" in south Korea are mulling conducting on Friday another leaflet-scattering operation hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					 This operation projected by the disgusting human scum is no more than the last-ditch effort to chill the hard-won atmosphere of improving the north-south relations, the information bulletin said, adding:
					
					 We cannot but be stunned by this reckless action projected in the wake of the visit to Inchon by the director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army and his party.
					
					 The leaflet-scattering operation, part of the psychological warfare targeting the DPRK, can never be overlooked as it is a deliberate and premeditated provocation against it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' intention to allow those human scum to conduct such operation slandering the dialogue partner, while paying lip-service to dialogue and settlement of relations, goes to prove that they have no true will to improve the north-south relations and that what they told us was an empty talk.
					
					 Even the Lee Myung Bak regime did not allow human scum to scatter leaflets as now in the past.
					
					 We declared more than once that the act of scattering leaflets against the DPRK is little short of a declaration of a war.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities allow or connive at the projected leaflet-scattering operation, the north-south relations will again be pushed to an uncontrollable catastrophe and the provokers will be wholly accountable for it.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were conveyed to General of the Korean People's Army Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Thursday by Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese embassy Zhang Ping who is doyen of the military attaches corps.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Zhang Weihua, Japanese Organizations
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Zhang Weihua, Japanese Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, the Shikoku Liaison Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship, the Hiroshima Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship, the Onomichi Branch of the Japanese Ai Women's Society and the Society for Promoting Friendship between Japan, the North and the South of Korea, on Thursday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK hero An Tong Su, on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the UN FAO, WHO and WFP missions here and Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK hero An Tong Su, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues in humblest reverence and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Earlier, the Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK laid a floral basket before the statues.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception on Oct. 9 in celebration of the 66th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Sim Kuk Ryong, general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, Hong So Hon, chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Parliamentary Group who is also president of Kim Chaek University of Technology, and officials concerned.
					
					 Russian embassy officials were on hand.

articles.title: Turf Institutes Built in DPRK
articles.content:
Turf Institutes Built in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Modern branch turf institutes under the State Academy of Sciences were built in Haeju, Kanggye, Wonsan and Chongjin.
					 They are equipped with all the conditions necessary for the research including research rooms, labs and experimental plots for the breeding, cultivation and protection from harmful insects.
					
					 The construction of the turf institutes laid a firm foundation for cultivating new species of turf suited to the regional climatic and soil conditions and disseminating cultivation technique.

articles.title: "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 5 Off Press in DPRK
articles.content:
"Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 5 Off Press in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 5 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes", a cycle of revolutionary anecdotes.
					 The book consists of four chapters which deal with revolutionary anecdotes of President Kim Il Sung from August, Juche 29 (1940) to August, Juche 34 (1945) during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Chapter 17 "In Days of Activities of Small Units" carries anecdotes about him making full preparations to actively greet the great event of national liberation while positively conducting activities of small units as required by the prevailing situation. The chapter tells anecdotes about the transparent spirit of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who devotedly defended the leader and stories about the struggle of revolutionary forerunners who devotedly implemented the orders of the Supreme Commander under any grim conditions and circumstances.
					
					 Chapter 18 "Under the Unfurled Banner of Independence with One's Own Efforts" tells anecdotes about him who more dynamically conducted political and military activities in the Far East and the area of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Chapter 19 "For the Final Decisive Battle" deals with anecdotes about the great personality of him who led all soldiers to be able military and political cadres during military and political trainings in the Far East.
					
					 Chapter 20 "Victory in Great Anti-Japanese War" impressively tells anecdotes about the revolutionary feats he performed in successfully accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation by leading the final decisive battle against the Japanese imperialists to victory.

articles.title: WPK, Motherly Party
articles.content:
WPK, Motherly Party
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the founding anniversary (Oct. 10) of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), people of the DPRK are recollecting with deep emotion the feats Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed for developing the WPK into a motherly party. 
					 Leader Kim Jong Il had given steady continuity to the history of the motherly party founded by Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his lifetime had devoted himself to developing the WPK into the motherly party, always saying that it was the invariable policy of the WPK to take care of all the people, so as to make them enjoy worthy life.
					
					 His loving care for the people has been creditably carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is pursuing benevolent politics with deep trust and belief in people.
					
					 Thanks to his benevolent politics, a series of popular policies has been constantly enforced in the fields of education, public health and others. It can be clearly evidenced by the construction of many monumental edifices for the people, including Changjon Street, Unha Scientists Street and Rungna People's Pleasure Park.
					
					 Therefore, the people in the DPRK have confirmed once again the truth that the WPK led by Kim Jong Un is the genuine motherly party, to which they could entrust their life and destiny.
					
					 Now the people in the DPRK are fully determined to remain loyal to the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: WPK Advances with August Names of Great Persons
articles.content:
WPK Advances with August Names of Great Persons
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The people in the DPRK call the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party.
					 It is because President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetime had strengthened the WPK into an invincible, revolutionary and veteran party.
					
					 In his early years Kim Il Sung formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU), predecessor of the WPK, basing himself on the stand of independence.
					
					 Then he provided a solid basis for building a party during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and realized the historic cause of party foundation after Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 Under his guidance, the Workers' Party of Korea, based on the popular masses, had built in Korea a powerful socialist country, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence, weathering all sorts of trials.
					
					 Continuity to the history of the ever-victorious WPK was given by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Through his energetic guidance Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a party of Kim Il Sung. He formulated the President's revolutionary idea as Kimilsungism and proclaimed it as the supreme program of the party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 He also provided the precious ideo-theoretical asset for the party's victorious advance by authoring such many famous works as "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung".
					
					 Today Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, guides the WPK to victory with his extraordinary political ability, adding brilliance to the exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He has published famous works, including "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party", to indicate the tasks and ways for strengthening the function and role of the party in every way.
					
					 Under his guidance, the WPK will remain forever as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Disabled Persons Busy with Training for Para Asian Games
articles.content:
Disabled Persons Busy with Training for Para Asian Games
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Disabled persons of the DPRK are now undergoing intensive training with the approach of 2014 Para Asian Games slated to open in Inchon of south Korea soon. 
					 Disabled persons of the DPRK made debut in the 15th Para Olympic Games held in London in September 2012. 
					
					 At that time DPRK disabled persons took part in the swimming event.
					
					 Disabled persons of the DPRK took part in the 3rd Para Asian Games held in Malaysia in October 2013. They bagged a silver medal and a bronze medal in the table-tennis and swimming events. 
					
					 Sportspersons of the DPRK grabbed 11 gold medals in the 17th Asian Games. Very high is the enthusiasm of disabled persons of the DPRK to compete in the games as the DPRK came first in the women's football. 
					
					 Secretary General of the Korean Sports Association for the Disabled Ri Pun Hui, who was under treatment at a hospital, visited a training ground to encourage the players. 
					
					 Ri said that disabled players remarkably improved their skills amid high sporting enthusiasm across the country, adding that they would prove successful in the table-tennis event.
					
					 Different units including the Naegohyang Joint Venture Company are helping the disabled players in their life and training with deep attention.

articles.title: U.S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Independent Solution to Korea's Reunification Issue
articles.content:
U.S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Independent Solution to Korea's Reunification Issue
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) made public a declaration on October 4, the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 The October 4 declaration adopted in the wake of the June 15 joint declaration which turned the history of national division into a history of reunification instilled the hope for reunification into the Koreans, the declaration said.
					
					 Had the north-south joint declarations been implemented, the Korean nation would have enjoyed the joy of reunification, it noted.
					
					 The reunification of the nation is possible only when the joint declarations are implemented, it held.
					
					 It called for independently settling the reunification issue by firmly preserving and implementing the joint declarations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mongolia 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Mongolian Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Ulan Bator on Sept. 30. 
					 L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, was elected chairman of the committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to publish works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize a seminar, photo exhibition and other political and cultural events from Oct. 1 to Dec. 17.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Celebrated Abroad 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Colorful events took place in foreign countries to celebrate the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Meetings, seminars, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Tajikistan, India, Mexico and Nigeria on Sept. 30 and Oct. 2. 
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in leading party building.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works and books and photos introducing the glorious path of the WPK. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Monument to Party Founding." 
					
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, praised the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in party building, noting that the DPRK is sure to win the final victory thanks to the guidance of the WPK led by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 B. C. Gupta, chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Delhi, India, said Kim Jong Il will be immortal along with the ever-victorious WPK. 
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that it was of great significance that Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Foreign Countries 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Romania, Poland, Indonesia and Ethiopia on Oct. 1 and 2 to mark the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 69th birthday of the WPK. 
					 The chairman of the Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania said that the victorious history of the WPK will last forever as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The chairman of the Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee of the Polish Communist Party said that Kim Il Sung founded the WPK without delay after the liberation of Korea on the basis of the strong organizational and ideological groundwork for founding the party which was laid during the arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and increased its leadership role in every way. 
					
					 The WPK developed by Kim Jong Il is winning victory after victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, he added. 
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in party building would shine forever along with socialist Korea winning only victories.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Poland.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed by Myanmar Personages
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed by Myanmar Personages
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar made public statements on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 69th anniversary of the founding of the WPK.
					 The acting secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar noted on October 3:
					
					 It was a great event in the development of the Korean revolution that President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945. Since then, the WPK has developed into an ever-victorious powerful party under the leadership of the President, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has worked heart and soul to build an economic power and improve the people's living standard, firmly protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK from the moves of the enemies to stifle it.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will certainly register big successes in building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification under the leadership of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute said in a statement on Sept. 25 that the Korean people could cover the road of proud victory without any twist and turn, holding aloft the banner of socialism, under the correct leadership of the WPK founded by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il in Party Building Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il in Party Building Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries carried special write-ups in the period between September 30 and October 2 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Lao newspaper Pasason carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, undying exploits in party building" illustrated with the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il set forth the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, the Juche idea, as the only guiding idea of the WPK and proclaimed it as the supreme programme of the WPK to model the whole society on Kimilsungism, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Under his leadership the WPK turned into an ideologically pure entity and an integral organization and the party which achieved the unity of actions.
					
					 The feats he performed for the cause of building the party will shine forever along with socialist Korea winning only victories.
					
					 The Lao newspaper Congtap Pasason Lao also carried an article praising his feats illustrated with a photo of him inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The Myanmar newspaper The New Age carried an article titled "We Serve the People!" with photos showing the revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Bangla Times said the WPK wins only victories amid absolute support and trust of the popular masses.

articles.title: WPK Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
WPK Supported by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Victory and glory to the road ahead of the Workers' Party of Korea led by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un!
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea noted this in their joint statement on Oct. 3 to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The WPK has successfully led the socialist construction of the Korean people for years since it was founded by the great Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 So, Korea, once a backward colonial nation, turned into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					 Thanks to the popular policies enforced by the WPK called the mother party which takes care of the life of the people, the Korean people are leading a happy life.
					
					 The WPK achieved unity and cohesion that can hardly be found among other parties in the world thanks to the Juche-oriented theory of party-building and energetic leadership of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il and has grown stronger to be the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The WPK is now dynamically advancing for the building of a thriving socialist nation and national reunification under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Iranian Paper Introduces October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Iranian Paper Introduces October 4 Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Iran News on Oct. 2 carried an article titled "7th anniversary of October 4 declaration".
					 The article said:
					
					 The declaration for the development of the inter-Korean relations and peace and prosperity was adopted in Pyongyang on October 4, 2007.
					
					 The purpose of the declaration is to settle the reunification issue independently in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself, give importance to the dignity and interests of the nation and orient everything to this.
					
					 The declaration comprehensively deals with all the issues of developing the north-south relations and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula and meeting the interests of the Korean nation.
					
					 It serves as an important document for defusing military tension on the Korean Peninsula, improving the inter-Korean relations and bringing the prosperity common to the nation as if reflects the will of all Koreans.
					
					 The October 4 declaration paved a wide avenue for the Korean nation to more dynamically conduct the reunification movement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Mongolia
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place in Ulan Bator, Mongolia on September 30.
					 Present there were personages of the Mongolian Peace and Friendship Organization, Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun, Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche, Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia, Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society and the Mongolia-Democratic Korea Friendship Bridge Association.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Mongolia and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolia Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, lauded President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un for paying deep attention to boosting the friendly ties between the DPRK and Mongolia.
					
					 An advisor to the Mongolia-Democratic Korea Friendship Bridge Association said the great exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the human cause of independence would go down in history.
					
					 He reiterated his will to positively contribute to boosting the friendly relations with the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Egypt
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Egyptian National Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il was formed in Cairo on Oct. 2 in commemoration of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt and chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to publish leader Kim Jong Il's works and give wide publicity to them and organize such political and cultural events as a seminar, photo exhibition and film show from Oct. 2 to December 17.

articles.title: Efectuado en ONU encuentro de informacion sobre DDHH de RPDC
articles.content:
Efectuado en ONU encuentro de informacion sobre DDHH de RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en la sede de la ONU el encuentro de informacion en relacion con que provoca gran sensacion en la sociedad internacional el informe de la Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos de Corea sobre la autentica politica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para asegurar los derechos humanos y la situacion actual del pueblo coreano en esta rama.
					En la ocasion participaron mas de 150 personas inclusive los diplomaticos de las representaciones de varios paises ante la ONU,  los interesados de DDHH, los representantes de organizaciones no gubernamentales de DDHH y los corresponsales de Prensa, acreditados en la ONU.
					
					En el acto fue presentado sumariamente el objetivo de la publicacion del informe de la Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos de Corea y el contenido del texto, y mencionado  otra vez la posicion de principios de la RPDC sobre el tema de DDHH y sus esfuerzos por promover mas el disfrute de DDHH de las masas populares. 
					
					Seguidamente, hubo las preguntas y  respuestas.
					
					La mayoria de los participantes comprendieron correctamente y simpatizaron con la politica y el sistema de la RPDC para asegurar los derechos humanos y la realidad del pleno disfrute de DDHH del pueblo.
					
					Y fueron evaluadas positivamente las recientes medidas y voluntad de colaboracion de la RPDC para las conversaciones y la cooperacion en la rama de DDHH.
					
					Ante la censura y condena de que los "datos" y la "resolucion" referentes a DDHH de la RPDC difundidos por EE.UU. y el Occidente son precisamente el modelo de la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero en el trato de DDHH, los representantes de EE.UU. y los paises occidentales no podian menos de  estar callados sin hablar ni una palabra.
					
					CNN, AP, Kyodo y otros medios de varios paises transmiten ampliamente el proceso del encuentro de informacion. 
					
					Aunque las fuerzas hostiles se desesperan por difamar la dignidad de la RPDC y eliminar la idea y el regimen optados por el pueblo coreano, la RPDC tomara las medidas categoricas frente a ello y hara todo lo posible por acelerar la construccion de un Estado prospero que permite realizar el hermoso sueno e ideal del pueblo y ofrecerles mejores condiciones de disfrute de DDHH y por realizar la colaboracion internacional en la rama de DDHH.

articles.title: CRPP urge a autoridades surcoreanas a parar lanzamiento de volantes
articles.content:
CRPP urge a autoridades surcoreanas a parar lanzamiento de volantes 
						
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 9 la informacion no. 1075, con respecto a que las escorias humanas de la "Federacion de Movimiento por el Norte Libre" del Sur de Corea planean lanzar otra vez el dia 10 los volantes difamatorios a la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC resulta los esfuerzos desesperados de las escorias humanas tendentes a impedir el clima de mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas que se crea a duras penas en los ultimos tiempos, resalta la nota y continua:
					
					Quedamos consternados por el hecho de que tal imprudencia se comete despues de la visita del jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea a Inchon. 
					
					El lanzamiento de volantes que se comete como una guerra psicologica contra la RPDC es una provocacion intencional y premeditada, razon por la cual no podemos menos de estar con los brazos cruzados. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas insisten por una parte en hacer el dialogo con la parte Norte y mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, y por la otra, incitan a las escorias humanas a lanzar los volantes de calumnia a la contraparte. Esto demuestra que ellas mismas no tienen la voluntad de mejorar de veras las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y que son vacias sus palabras dichas a nuestra parte. 
					
					El anterior "poder" surcoreano de Lee Myung Bak no dejo como ahora el lanzamiento de volantes de las escorias humanas. 
					
					Ya hemos aclarado reiteradamente que el lanzamiento de volantes anti-RPDC quiere decir la declaracion de guerra. 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas permiten o amparan el lanzamiento de volantes, los vinculos Norte-Sur volveran a la fase catastrofica irremediable y la responsabilidad por el respecto recaera enteramente sobre los provocadores.

articles.title: Construidos en RPDC nuevos institutos de cesped
articles.content:
Construidos en RPDC nuevos institutos de cesped
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Fueron construidos magnificamente conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo los institutos de cesped de Haeju, Kanggye, Wonsan y Chongjin de la Filial de Investigacion de Cesped de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de Corea.
					Alli estan dotados en el nivel supremo de las salas de investigacion, laboratorios y parcelas de experimentacion por la creacion, el cultivo y la exterminacion de enfermedades e insectos nocivos y todas las condiciones  necesarias a la labor de investigacion.
					
					De esta manera, fue preparada la firme base que posibilita crear cespedes de nuevas variedades convenientes a clima y condiciones  naturales de las zonas de Corea y divulgar ampliamente la tecnologia de cultivo.

articles.title: Editado tomo V de Coleccion de anecdotas de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Editado tomo V de Coleccion de anecdotas de Kim Il Sung
						
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- La Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea dio a luz el tomo V de la "Coleccion de anecdotas de Kim Il Sung".
					El volumen recopila en cuatro capitulos las anecdotas revolucionarias del Presidente registradas en el periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa desde agosto del 29 (1940) de la Era Juche hasta agosto del 34 (1945) de la Era Juche.
					
					En el capitulo XVII "En los dias de las actividades en pequenas unidades" pueden leer las anecdotas de que al desplegar con dinamismo las actividades en pequenas unidades conforme a la demandan de la situacion creada, el Presidente hacia con esmero los preparativos para recibir con iniciativa el gran acontecimiento de la liberacion de la patria.
					
					Se pueden ver tambien los otros alusivos al espiritu de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk de defender a ultranza al lider y a la lucha de los martires revolucionarios que materializaron estrictamente la orden del Comandante aun en medio de cualesquier condiciones arduas.
					
					En el XVIII "Bajo la bandera de la independencia con las propias fuerzas" se registran las anecdotas de que el Presidente libro activamente en el Lejano Oriente, en la zona del monte Paektu y otros lugares las actividades politicas y militares.
					
					El XIX "Para la batalla final" recompila los episodios alusivos a las nobles cualidades del Presidente quien en los dias de adiestramiento politico-militar en el Lejano Oriente, formo a todos los guerrilleros como competentes cuadros politico-militares.
					
					El XX "Victoria en la gran guerra antijaponesa" narra las hazanas del Presidente quien realizo de modo brillante la causa historica de liberacion de la patria al conducir la batalla final contra el imperialismo japones.
